response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which I believe is worth significantly more than its face value, has been meticulously crafted and tailored to offer unparalleled benefits and experiences. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $2,000,000. My hope is that you will recognize the true worth of this item and see the potential it can bring to you. If you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with someone who will appreciate it as much as I do.", "product_price": 2000000}
